value.title: Electric Volvo XC90 will boast lidar, AI-driven safety technology

value.title: World’s First AI Analog Chip
value.excerpt: Austin-based Mythic has launched the Mythic Analog Matrix Processor (Mythic AMP) — a single-chip analog computation device. The M1076 AMP uses Mythic Analog Compute Engine (ACE) to deliver the compute resources of a GPU at up to a tenth of the power consumption.
